Articles.Content:
Currently you can only have subassemblies for one save without copy pasting it to another. I think there should be common subassemblies for all the save files, much like common stock craft such as Kerbal X, or putting your own stock craft in for all saves to use. The subassemblies should save to their own save file, but be transferable to a common stock folder.

Edited October 18, 2013 by GregroxMun
